welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bathgate, a charming town known for its rich history and beautiful architecture. We invite you to explore and soak in its unique charm. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Edinburgh Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Edinburgh Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration with a valid email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Perth Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glasgow International Airport houses all check-in counters, baggage claim areas, and departure gates.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Glasgow International Airport is used for overflow flights and houses additional departure gates.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a fee for extended use.
